text: Kho endio nilwakhwabalamusia kho bareebane abeene khubeene, naboola omubooli mubo mbu: “mwikhalemwo tsinyanga tsinga?” naboola mbu : “ khwikhalemwo inyanga ndala nohomba ebuleka weyinyanga.” Nibaboola mbu “ Nyasaye wenyu amanyile muno ebise bia mwekhalamwo. Kho mana murume mulala wenyu nende amamondo kenyu kano khushiro mana ahenje eshiakhulia shina eshilayimunoabarerere. Neakholeamakhuwa kano mumachesi ne alabarumbulakhwo khuyesiyesi tawe
